name: World Legacy - "World Lance"
description:
Your opponent's monsters cannot attack "World Legacy" monsters you control, except this one. You can only use each of the following effects of "World Legacy - "World Lance"" once per turn.
â— If 2 monsters battle, including a Link Monster, during damage calculation (Quick Effect): You can discard this card; your opponent's battling monster loses 3000 ATK.
â— If a monster(s) is Special Summoned from the Extra Deck: Special Summon 1 "World Legacy Token" (Machine/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) to each player's field in Defense Position.
